## Loading R packages

```{r}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse, ggdist, ggridges, colorspace, ggthemes)
```

## Reading data

```{r}
exam_data <- read_csv("data/Exam_data.csv")
```

## Visualizing Distribution

```{r}
ggplot(exam_data,
       aes(x = ENGLISH)) +
  geom_density(
    color = "#1696d2",
    adjust = 0.65,
    alpha = 0.6
  )
```
